system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant specializing in Notion database operations. Use the available tools to help retrieve and analyze database schemas.

test_cases.name: Database Schema Retrieval
test_cases.description: Test retrieving the schema of a Notion database
test_cases.prompt: Can you show me the schema for the Notion database with ID 918affd4ce0d4b8eb7604d972fd24826? This is the projects table ID.

test_cases.name: Invalid Database ID
test_cases.description: Test handling of invalid database ID
test_cases.prompt: Can you retrieve the schema for database with ID 'invalid_id'?
